summary: IN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating masonry design and construction; repealing Sections 2401 through 2421 and table Nos. 24-A through 24-G of the Building Code (Ordinance 85500) and adding thereto, in lien of said sections and tables repealed, new sections designated Sections 2401 through 2406 adopting by reference with certain modifications Chapter 24, "Masonry," of the Uniform Building Code.
